title: PM to visit Khairpur to oversee post-flood rehabilitation work
content:
ISLAMABAD, Dec 21 (APP): Prime Minister Shehbaz Sharif will pay a day-long visit to Khairpur, Sindh today to oversee the rehabilitation work for the flood-affected people.
The prime minister will also meet the flood-affected people.
A briefing will be given to the prime minister on the ongoing rehabilitation projects for the flood-affected people.
